messages.subject: FW:  OT - taking a poll
messages.msgSnippet: This is from a member of my local yahoo list.  I asked if she d like the input of 150-odd  self-identified unschoolers, and she said yes, giving me
messages.messageBody:
This is from a member of my local yahoo list. I asked if she'd like the
input of 150-odd <g> self-identified unschoolers, and she said yes, giving
me permission to post to this list. She's a way-cool old-time unschooler
:-) Note that she requests replies sent privately, although I did give her
the url for this list, as she was very interested.

Nancy
----------

> Hi All,
>
> I am working on the cover design for my book Homeschooling
> Reflections. This is my question -- who would you suggest that I ask
> to read and give me a testimonial or endorsement?
>
> In other words, if you were reading the cover - who would impress you
> in the un/homeschooling world??
>
> Please e-mail me privately with your response-
>
> conniecolten@...
> or
> hsreflections@...
>
> Thanks in advance for your help! ;-)
>
> Connie
